name: Seated Hamstring Stretch
setup: Sit on floor with legs extended straight in front
steps: Hinge forward from hips, keeping back flat
Reach hands toward feet or shins
Focus on folding from hips, not rounding spine
Feel stretch along back of legs
Breathe deeply and relax into stretch
cues: Hinge from hips, not lower back
Depth matters less than good form
safety: Stop if you feel sharp pain. Bend knees slightly if needed. Avoid aggressive bouncing. This stretch is not about touching toes.

regressions: Sit on folded towel or cushion
Stretch one leg at a time

prescriptionHints.notes: Classic hamstring stretch. Focus on hip hinge, not how far you can reach. Consistency over intensity.

joints.notes: Keep spine long to protect lower back. Bend knees if needed to maintain good form.
